title: How much should I expect?
content:
I did full 12th chem, and maths but my maths is only at the ncert level
I studied onyl formulas and its applications of 11th and 12th physics.
Should I expect anything more than 75?

comments.body: yeah 85 easily i think
Hoe much would that be in rank? 5kish?
i think 3kish coz this year negative marking was there so cutoff will fall dratically

bro there is normalisation in pessat, So there will be percentile system if u r in top 2%tile in ur shift ur rank will be fine cause nobody can tell about ur marks. So marks vs rank will depend on how many question are solved correctly by other students.
Nah I doubt it, cuz 85 seems too low for 3k and even 5k

Then too there's got to be a median somewhere right
Well whatever not expecting much anyway
How many questions did you attempt and out of them how many did you guess
No I'm asking how much will I get if I only studied this
No I'm asking how much will I get if I only studied this

Isnt pes over? 
I thought last date was 6th may
Nah tmmrws mine

All the best!!!! 
Lemme know how it goes!!!!

i wrote my pessat on 8th. tbh its a bit towards jee, not really jee level but i hope you get it :)  
math you need to have knowledge of bit higher than ncert i could say, chemistry i hope you studied the deleted portion of cbse(i didnt) cuz they spammed it and the same for physics(radioacitivity law and shit)  
finally you will not at all be able to solve180/180 qn so if u see a lengthy, jus skip it cuz it wudnt be worth it.

Hope it helped!

how many questions did you answer out of 180   
and out of them how many did you guess
i answered 160-165 with like 5 guesses?

You mustve found the exam relatively easy then

it was typically way easier compared to jee so yes i cud say?(omitting the deleted)
well this years out of 141 so i scored arnd 115ish as i had most of the deleted qn earlier but i knew them as i solved the concepts for jee adv(im cbse so i had no clue abt state/kcet deleted)
what are you studying btw?

115 out of 180? Or 115 out of 141. Eitherways its great ngl:) 
And yeah im cbse too

wbu? what did u fare in kcet,pessat and jee?
